channel.title: 718 rune evo dont want Npcs to atk me
channel.description: Hi guys im using rune evo and im wondering if there is a way where i walk beside Npcs (barrows) and they dont atk me until i atk them, and i wanna make them so they dont move Btw I've already packed the unpackednpc so everything is fine and they are spawning and that shit but thats whats the problem is (what i said earlier)l

item.title: 718 rune evo dont want Npcs to atk me
item.dc:creator: @kingmen139 kingmen139
item.description:
@kingmen139 wrote:

mate, i have a problem, i cant find them in npcspawning or should i just write the id of them?

Read full topic
item.source: 718 rune evo dont want Npcs to atk me

item.title: 718 rune evo dont want Npcs to atk me
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

im using the exact same source, to make them not attack you go unpackedcombatdefinitions.text and find where the barrows brothers are. where it says AGGRESSIVE change to PASSIVE, to make them not move you got to find them in npcspawning.java (or.txt 1 of the 2) and where it says true beside there name, put false . Hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: 718 rune evo dont want Npcs to atk me
